p: Finally, an extract from the aerial parts of Condea albida (syn. Hyptis albida) obtained with a mixture of dichloromethane and methanol (1:1) demonstrated effectiveness against strains of Trichomonas vaginalis (GT-13) (MIC 11.4 μg/mL) and Giardia lamblia (0989:IMSS) (MIC 16.1 μg/mL) ( Camacho-Corona et al., 2015). The effect against Giardia lamblia could explain the use of this plant for the treatment of gastrointestinal disturbances ( Martínez, 1979).
